item.title: Holly add a quote by Truman Capote
item.description: "Failure is the condiment that gives success its flavor." -- Truman Capote

item.title: Holly add a quote by Winston S. Churchill
item.description: "Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts." -- Winston S. Churchill

item.title: Holly add a quote by Thomas A. Edison
item.description: "I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work." -- Thomas A. Edison

item.title: Holly add a quote by Winston S. Churchill
item.description: "Success is stumbling from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm." -- Winston S. Churchill

item.title: Holly add a quote by Salvador Dali
item.description: "Have no fear of perfection - you'll never reach it." -- Salvador Dali

item.title: Holly add a quote by Coco Chanel
item.description: "Don't spend time beating on a wall, hoping to transform it into a door. " -- Coco Chanel

item.title: Holly add a quote by Randy Pausch
item.description: "The brick walls are there for a reason. The brick walls are not there to keep us out. The brick walls are there to give us a chance to show how badly we want something. Because the brick walls are there to stop the people who don’t want it badly enough. They’re there to stop the other people." -- Randy Pausch

item.title: Holly add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description: "You may encounter many defeats, but you must not be defeated. In fact, it may be necessary to encounter the defeats, so you can know who you are, what you can rise from, how you can still come out of it." -- Maya Angelou

item.title: Holly add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "Just because you fail once doesn't mean you're gonna fail at everything." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Holly add a quote by Henry David Thoreau
item.description: "If we will be quiet and ready enough, we shall find compensation in every disappointment." -- Henry David Thoreau

item.title: Holly add a quote by H.G. Wells
item.description: "If you fell down yesterday, stand up today." -- H.G. Wells

item.title: Holly add a quote by Ken Robinson
item.description: "If you're not prepared to be wrong, you'll never come up with anything original." -- Ken Robinson

item.title: Holly add a quote by Henry Ford
item.description: "The only real mistake is the one from which we learn nothing." -- Henry Ford

item.title: Holly add a quote by Amelia Earhart
item.description: "I want to do it because I want to do it. Women must try to do things as men have tried. When they fail, their failure must be but a challenge to others." -- Amelia Earhart

item.title: Holly add a quote by Thomas A. Edison
item.description: "Negative results are just what I want. They’re just as valuable to me as positive results. I can never find the thing that does the job best until I find the ones that don’t." -- Thomas A. Edison
